title: Serverless Functions
prompt:
Create serverless functions for [USE CASE]:

Platform: [AWS Lambda/Google Cloud Functions/Azure]

Requirements:
1. Function implementation with validation
2. Triggers (HTTP, scheduled, database, queue)
3. Configuration (runtime, memory, timeout)
4. Dependencies and cold start optimization
5. Integration with cloud services
6. Performance optimization
7. Security (IAM, authentication)
8. Monitoring and logging
9. Testing (unit, integration, local)
10. Deployment (IaC, CI/CD)

Provide function code and infrastructure templates.
example: Create image processing function for uploads
